# HUD::GET_AI_PED_VEHICLE_BLIP_INDEX

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedID

## Returns
* **BLIP_INDEX**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the current AI BLIP for the specified ped
